website_summaries.verdict: Installs in minutes, and easy to take on the road. Fits both 7.5-foot and 10-foot hoops.
pros: Includes backstop net, storage bag and stakes
Easy to set up and take down
Net made from knotless netting that's 7-ply
Can be used with either 7.5 or 10-foot hoops
cons: Be careful to close all the toggles or the return won't work
Instructions may be challenging to find

customer_reviews.title: Easy Installation
customer_reviews.text: I assembled it by myself in about 30 minutes, no tools were needed. It is much bigger than I expected and appears to be well made. The net will definitely help prevent balls from entering my neighbor’s property. The return system will only work if you clasp all of the toggles on the slit in the net. The paper instructions say that video instructions are available on rukket.com; I could not find them on their website.
customer_reviews.author: P. Oke

customer_reviews.title: Works fabulous!!
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 4 stars because I have only had it a week so I don’t know how it holds up long term. But right now it is awesome!!! My kids love how they don’t have to chase the balls down a hill anymore and I’m sure the neighbor loves not having them on his property!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This keeps me and the kids out of the wild foliage behind the hoop when a shot goes awry. My only suggestion for improvement would be a wider span but it's really great as is.
customer_reviews.author: xXx Kev xXx

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put up and really works great in returning errant shots to the shooters. Grand kids love it and my wife appreciates the protection it affords her garden behind the goal.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Del Pero

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It's been up for a few months and the boys have used it quite a bit. It is still returning the balls and the net/supports aren't sagging!
customer_reviews.author: kkl

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday present for my 16 year old son. He wanted it to stop the basketball from rolling into the woods behind the net. It is very large and took some time to get it to sit properly around our movable basketball net. He’s very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: I received mine quickly but you could tell it was a returned item because the box was retaped and was missing two major piece for assembly. This is why I'm given this item a low rating. They should've QA'd before shipping. Daughter was disappointed!! #NotCool
customer_reviews.author: Terrence V. Williams

customer_reviews.title: So far so good...
customer_reviews.text: Looks to be well built. The materials are of good quality. Only time will tell on it’s longevity.
customer_reviews.author: chris godfrey

customer_reviews.title: Nice backstop.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality construction. Our hoop has a 6”x6” vertical post and the net has an opening designed for a smaller post. As a result, the roll-back option doesn't work and the ball gets captured in the net.
customer_reviews.author: FN

customer_reviews.title: The ability to build and disassemble easily
customer_reviews.text: Dislike - disassemble the product the metal button connector fall into the pipe. Like - very easy to put together and breakdown. Portable basketball hoop
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rusted already
customer_reviews.text: Came without instructions. Bottom crossbar already rusted together. Cannot disassemble
customer_reviews.author: don b.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: So far it is perfect. It has helped keep the stray a basketballs out of the landscaping
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great product- used for basketball backstop
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Very simple to assemble and all pieces were high quality materials. Have been using the backstop for a couple weeks and we absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Honrine

customer_reviews.title: Great value and keeps balls contained!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to up and our kids love that they don't have to go as far to retrieve their balls. (They miss a lot!)
customer_reviews.author: Wendi

customer_reviews.title: Works with a volleyball setting target.
customer_reviews.text: The setting target fits in the same spot the basketball hoop post would occupy. Works great! Now my daughter can practice her setting without chasing the ball all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Palumbo

customer_reviews.title: Leans back really far
customer_reviews.text: I like it and it does the intended job but it leans back really really far
customer_reviews.author: Annette Tomory

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put up. Great quality net fir the price.
customer_reviews.author: LBeckwith

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: great product - a bit challenging to get set up
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Does it’s job!  Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product works perfect used Amazon services to set up. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: This works great and is helpful containing balls!
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it! Semi-permanent fixture as it hooks to hoop pole, we have to un-assemble in order to take it down.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer anderson

customer_reviews.title: Should’ve bought it from day one...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for keeping the ball in play, less time chasing errant shots. Essential for solo play.
customer_reviews.author: William R.

customer_reviews.title: Overall good product.
customer_reviews.text: Overall good product. Very practical for suburban home. Less running for balls, more playing with kids.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard

customer_reviews.text: Would have been a lot easier if the pieces in the directions were labeled
customer_reviews.author: natasha

product_meta.title: Rukket Basketball Return Net Guard and Backstop, Hoop Rebound Back Netting Attachment for Yard, Home & Residential Use, Barrier System for Safety and Retention
feature_bullets: NEW PRODUCT LAUNCH SALE - PRACTICE FROM HOME: Rukket Basketball is here! Our first product is a must have for anyone with a basketball hoop at home. With the ball catch and return system, you can repetitively hit those 3s and spend less time chasing balls down the street! This product includes (1) Rukket Basketball Air Defense Return Net Backstop, (1) Carry Bag, and (4) Stakes. Return Net ONLY. This product is discounted for a limited time - add to cart now!

STOP CHASING BALLS INTO THE NEIGHBOR'S YARD - Never worry about chasing balls into the street or down your neighbor’s hill again. The Rukket return net and yard guard will catch any errant passes or missed shots and return them to the shooter.

SPEND MORE TIME MAKING SHOTS - Easy ball collection and roll back means more time practicing and less time chasing missed shots. To set up roll back pull the backstop as close to the shooter as possible. You’ll increase your shooting percentage in no time through rapid repetition. Everyone will be chanting swish at your next game.
NO HASSLE SET UP - Sets up in minutes and can be taken down just as easy. Comes with carry bag for easy transport and set up.
RUKKET 100% LIFETIME WARRANTY AND SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: Includes lifetime replacement parts and outstanding USA-based customer service for no-risk purchasing.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
